description: This Dart source file defines the GameController class that manages the state and logic of a snake game, including game initialization, movement, scoring, collision detection, and event notification.

classes.name: GameController
classes.description: A class extending ChangeNotifier that controls game state, movement, scoring, and collision detection for a snake game.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game to initial state, spawns a new snake, and food.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles between pause and start states.

methods.name: changeDirection
methods.description: Queues a direction change if it's not opposite to current movement.

methods.name: _tickMove
methods.description: Executes a single movement tick, updating snake position, checking collisions, and handling food consumption.

methods.name: _endGame
methods.description: Ends the game, stops movement, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: _spawnFood
methods.description: Spawns a new food point in a random location not occupied by the snake.

methods.name: _isOpposite
methods.description: Determines whether two directions are opposites to prevent instant 180-degree turns.
